languages.text: {n}Октавиана бледнеет, глядя то на осколки бутылки, то на вас.{/n} "Смилуйтесь, {mf|господин|госпожа}! Я не ведала, что и вы состоите во вражде с Винтерскейлами. Молю, не гневайтесь — больше такого не повторится!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Октавиана бледнеет, глядя то на осколки бутылки, то на вас.{/n} "Смилуйтесь, {mf|господин|госпожа}! Я не ведала, что и вы состоите во вражде с Винтерскейлами. Молю, не гневайтесь — больше такого не повторится!"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Octaviana grows pale as she shifts her gaze between the bottle shards and you.{/n} "Have mercy, my {mf|lord|lady}! I never knew you, too, were an enemy of the Winterscales. Pray, don't be angry! It won't happen again!"
languages.original_text: {n}Октавиана бледнеет, глядя то на осколки бутылки, то на вас.{/n} "Смилуйтесь, {mf|господин|госпожа}! Я не ведала, что и вы состоите во вражде с Винтерскейлами. Молю, не гневайтесь — больше такого не повторится!"

traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: {n}奥克塔维娜脸色变得苍白，视线在酒瓶碎片与你之间游移。{/n}“饶命，大人！我不知道原来你也是温特斯凯尔的敌人！求求你，别再生气了！这种事情再也不会发生了！”
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana grows pale as she shifts her gaze between the bottle shards and you.{/n} "Have mercy, my {mf|lord|lady}! I never knew you, too, were an enemy of the Winterscales. Pray, don't be angry! It won't happen again!"

traits.locale_text: {n}奥克塔维娜脸色变得苍白，视线在酒瓶碎片与你之间游移。{/n}“饶命，大人！我不知道原来你也是温特斯凯尔的敌人！求求你，别再生气了！这种事情再也不会发生了！”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: {n}オクタヴィアナはボトルの破片とあなたの間を見つめて、どんどん顔を青ざめさせる。{/n}「陛下、どうか慈悲を！まさかあなたもウィンタースケールの敵だったなんて。お願いです、怒らないでください！もう二度とあんな事は起こりませんから！」
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana grows pale as she shifts her gaze between the bottle shards and you.{/n} "Have mercy, my {mf|lord|lady}! I never knew you, too, were an enemy of the Winterscales. Pray, don't be angry! It won't happen again!"

traits.locale_text: {n}オクタヴィアナはボトルの破片とあなたの間を見つめて、どんどん顔を青ざめさせる。{/n}「陛下、どうか慈悲を！まさかあなたもウィンタースケールの敵だったなんて。お願いです、怒らないでください！もう二度とあんな事は起こりませんから！」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Octaviana se vuelve pálida mientras su mirada vaga entre tú y los fragmentos de la botella.{/n} «¡Tenga piedad, mi{mf|lord|lady}! No sabía que usted también era enemig{mf|o|a} de los Winterscales. ¡Por favor, no se enfade! ¡No volverá a pasar!».
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana grows pale as she shifts her gaze between the bottle shards and you.{/n} "Have mercy, my {mf|lord|lady}! I never knew you, too, were an enemy of the Winterscales. Pray, don't be angry! It won't happen again!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana se vuelve pálida mientras su mirada vaga entre tú y los fragmentos de la botella.{/n} «¡Tenga piedad, mi{mf|lord|lady}! No sabía que usted también era enemig{mf|o|a} de los Winterscales. ¡Por favor, no se enfade! ¡No volverá a pasar!».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Octaviana blickt zwischen den Flaschenscherben und dir hin und her und erbleicht.{/n} "Habt Gnade, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft! Ich wusste nicht, dass auch Ihr ein Feind der Winterzunders seid. Seid nicht wütend, ich flehe Euch an! Es wird nicht wieder vorkommen!"
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana grows pale as she shifts her gaze between the bottle shards and you.{/n} "Have mercy, my {mf|lord|lady}! I never knew you, too, were an enemy of the Winterscales. Pray, don't be angry! It won't happen again!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana blickt zwischen den Flaschenscherben und dir hin und her und erbleicht.{/n} "Habt Gnade, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft! Ich wusste nicht, dass auch Ihr ein Feind der Winterzunders seid. Seid nicht wütend, ich flehe Euch an! Es wird nicht wieder vorkommen!"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Octaviana pâlit en regardant les tessons de verre avant de relever les yeux vers vous.{/n} « Pitié, Votre Seigneurie ! J'ignorais que vous étiez {mf|un ennemi|une ennemie} des Winterscale. Je vous en supplie, ne vous énervez pas ! Ça ne se reproduira pas ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana grows pale as she shifts her gaze between the bottle shards and you.{/n} "Have mercy, my {mf|lord|lady}! I never knew you, too, were an enemy of the Winterscales. Pray, don't be angry! It won't happen again!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana pâlit en regardant les tessons de verre avant de relever les yeux vers vous.{/n} « Pitié, Votre Seigneurie ! J'ignorais que vous étiez {mf|un ennemi|une ennemie} des Winterscale. Je vous en supplie, ne vous énervez pas ! Ça ne se reproduira pas ! »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Beti benzi atan Octaviana'nın gözleri, bir sana bir cam parçalarına kayıyor.{/n} "Merhamet edin {mf|lordum|leydim}! Sizin de Winterscale düşmanı olduğunuzdan bihaberdim. Kızmayın, ne olur! Bir daha olmaz!"
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana grows pale as she shifts her gaze between the bottle shards and you.{/n} "Have mercy, my {mf|lord|lady}! I never knew you, too, were an enemy of the Winterscales. Pray, don't be angry! It won't happen again!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Beti benzi atan Octaviana'nın gözleri bir sana bir cam parçalarına kayıyor.{/n} "Merhamet edin {mf|lordum|leydim}! Sizin de Winterscale düşmanı olduğunuzdan bihaberdim. Kızmayın, ne olur! Bir daha olmaz!"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04
